sentences.sContent: French and German were deemed essential.
sentences.sCn: 法语和德语被认为是必需的。

sentences.sContent: ...Why does the author deem it inappropriate for Harvard to confer air honorary degree on Oprah Winfrey...

exam.question: Anyone not paying the registration fee by the end of this month will be ______ to have withdrawn from the program.

answer.explain: 句意： 本月底没有交纳注册费的人将被视为退出本计划。contemplate： 凝视； acknowledge： 承认； anticipate： 预期。

synos.tran: 认为，持某种看法；作某种评价

trans.tranOther: to think of something in a particular way or as having a particular quality
